name: Red Card
description:
Hey there new recruit and welcome to your first day on the job. What we do here is decide if our monster applicants are worthy of being granted a red card that lets them into Hell to work as Hellkeepers. Your job is to go through and applications and pick out the monsters that hit our minimum characteristic criteria as outlined in the official Hell Agent guidebook you were given. Good luck manning the gates, and watch out for the boulders!

Featuring art by Perry
